gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 122, Hornets 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Hornets, 122-108. Jalen Brunson recorded 32 points, seven assists, and three rebounds for the Knicks, with Donte DiVincenzo adding a career-high 25 points and seven 3PM in the victory. LaMelo Ball tallied 34 points, nine assists, and five rebounds for the Hornets, while Brandon Miller dropped a new career high 29 points in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 8-5 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 3-9.
